title: Family Fun Day
text:
10:00 a.m. Saturday, Nov. 21, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Sports JOIN THIS FUN DAY OF FUN, FOOD AND TENNIS FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY! ALL MONEY RAISED FOR EVENT GOES DIRECTLY TO LEE COUNTY SPECIAL OLYMPICS. Family Fun Day will be held at The Forest Country Club Tennis Center on Saturday, November 21st from 10:00am - 2:00pm. Family Fun Day is the one & only initiative for our The Forest's larger-scale event called Play with a Purpose that is on Saturday, February 6th. All money raised for both events goes directly to Lee County Special Olympics. This exciting, new event is open to all in Southwest Florida. We'll have many of the special Olympians & their families here. We'll have designated courts for tennis drills & games for special Olympians, youth & adult tennis players. Additionally, we'll have carnival-style games, an exhibition match & food too! All for just $5 per person. If anyone has any questions or would like to sign up, they may call The Forest Tennis Shop at 239-482-8690. $5.00 per person Related
